description: Identifier of the maintenance task or system category this user-defined field relates to (e.g., Air System, Engine); likely references a task master record rather than a numeric ID; confirm with SME.
Value captured for the task’s user-defined field—often a component, part, or attribute (e.g., Air Compressor, Filter).
Username or process identifier that created the UDF record.
Timestamp when the UDF record was created.
Username or process identifier that last updated the UDF record.
Timestamp of the most recent update to the UDF record.
